comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
Causes the simulated player to use an item on a block.
The block at the specified block location must be solid.
Returns true if the item was used.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Location to use the item upon.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Direction to place the specified item within.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Location relative to the bottom north-west corner of the block where the item is placed.
